name: Water Heater Replacement (Tank)
description: Removing an old tank water heater and installing a new one, including water and gas/electric connections.

name: Tankless Water Heater Installation
description: Installing a tankless (on-demand) water heater with gas or electric connections and venting.

name: Main Water Line Repair
description: Repairing or replacing sections of the main water supply line from the street to the house.

name: Sewer Line Repair / Replacement
description: Excavation and repair or replacement of damaged sewer lines using traditional or trenchless methods.

name: Backflow Preventer Installation
description: Installing a certified backflow prevention device on the water supply to meet municipal code.

name: Gas Line Installation / Extension
description: Running new gas lines or extending existing ones for appliances, fireplaces, or outdoor kitchens.

name: Bathroom Rough-In Plumbing
description: Running new supply and drain lines for a bathroom addition or relocation, including venting.

name: Sump Pump Installation (New)
description: Installing a new sump pump system including pit excavation, pump, discharge line, and check valve.

name: Whole-House Re-Pipe (Copper/PEX)
description: Complete replacement of all supply plumbing in a home with copper or PEX piping.

name: Septic System Inspection & Pump-Out
description: Inspecting a septic system, pumping out the tank, and providing a condition report.

name: Electrical Panel Upgrade (100A to 200A)
description: Upgrading the main electrical panel from 100-amp to 200-amp service, including new breakers.

name: Sub-Panel Installation
description: Installing a sub-panel in a garage, workshop, or addition fed from the main panel.

name: Whole-House Rewiring
description: Complete replacement of all electrical wiring in a home, including circuits, outlets, and switches.

name: EV Charger Installation (Level 2)
description: Installing a 240V Level 2 electric vehicle charger with dedicated circuit from the panel.

name: Knob-and-Tube Wiring Replacement
description: Removing legacy knob-and-tube wiring and replacing with modern NMD90 copper wiring to code.

name: Generator Installation (Standby)
description: Installing a whole-house standby generator with automatic transfer switch and fuel connection.

name: Hot Tub / Pool Electrical Hookup
description: Running a dedicated high-amp circuit and GFCI disconnect for a hot tub or pool equipment.

name: Aluminum Wiring Remediation
description: Applying approved COPALUM or AlumiConn connectors to aluminum wiring for fire safety compliance.

name: Recessed Lighting Installation (New Circuits)
description: Installing recessed (pot) lights with new wiring runs from the panel in ceilings.

name: Solar Panel Electrical Integration
description: Connecting rooftop solar panels to the home's electrical system with inverter, meter, and grid tie-in.

name: Furnace Replacement
description: Removing an old furnace and installing a new high-efficiency gas or electric furnace.

name: Central Air Conditioner Installation
description: Installing a central air conditioning system including condenser, evaporator coil, and refrigerant lines.

name: Heat Pump Installation (Mini-Split)
description: Installing a ductless mini-split heat pump system with indoor and outdoor units and refrigerant lines.

name: Ductwork Installation / Replacement
description: Installing new or replacing existing HVAC ductwork including trunk lines, branch runs, and registers.

name: Boiler Installation / Replacement
description: Installing or replacing a hydronic boiler for radiant floor or baseboard heating systems.

name: Radiant Floor Heating Installation
description: Installing hydronic or electric radiant floor heating under new flooring.

name: HRV / ERV Installation
description: Installing a heat recovery ventilator or energy recovery ventilator for whole-house ventilation.

name: Gas Fireplace Installation
description: Installing a gas fireplace insert or direct-vent unit with gas line and venting.

name: HVAC System Annual Inspection & Tune-Up
description: Comprehensive HVAC system inspection, cleaning, calibration, and safety check by a licensed technician.

name: Refrigerant Recharge & Leak Repair
description: Locating refrigerant leaks, repairing lines, and recharging the HVAC system with proper refrigerant.

name: Full Kitchen Renovation
description: Complete kitchen renovation including cabinet install, countertops, backsplash, plumbing, and electrical.

name: Full Bathroom Renovation
description: Complete bathroom renovation including fixture replacement, tiling, plumbing, and electrical updates.

name: Basement Finishing / Renovation
description: Converting an unfinished basement into living space including framing, insulation, drywall, and finishes.

name: Load-Bearing Wall Modification
description: Removing or modifying a load-bearing wall with proper beam and post installation per engineering specs.

name: Hardwood Floor Installation
description: Installing solid or engineered hardwood flooring with proper subfloor preparation and finishing.

name: Hardwood Floor Refinishing
description: Sanding, staining, and applying polyurethane finish to existing hardwood floors.

name: Ceramic / Porcelain Tile Floor Installation
description: Installing ceramic or porcelain tile flooring including substrate prep, setting, grouting, and sealing.

name: Custom Shower Tile Installation
description: Installing waterproof membrane, tile, and grout in a shower enclosure including curb and niche.

name: Countertop Installation (Granite/Quartz)
description: Template, fabrication, and installation of granite or quartz countertops with undermount sink cutout.

name: Mold Remediation
description: Professional mold removal including containment, air filtration, removal, cleaning, and prevention.

name: Asbestos Testing & Abatement
description: Testing for asbestos-containing materials and professional removal/encapsulation per Ontario regulations.

name: Lead Paint Remediation
description: Safe removal or encapsulation of lead-based paint per health and safety regulations.

name: Retaining Wall Construction
description: Building a retaining wall using interlocking blocks, natural stone, or timber with proper drainage.

name: Large Tree Removal
description: Removing large trees over 15 feet including felling, sectioning, stump grinding, and debris removal.

name: Irrigation System Installation
description: Designing and installing a complete lawn irrigation system with zones, controllers, and backflow preventer.

name: French Drain Installation
description: Excavating and installing a French drain system with perforated pipe and gravel for water management.

name: Concrete Patio / Walkway Pouring
description: Forming, pouring, and finishing a concrete patio or walkway including rebar and expansion joints.

name: Deck Construction (New Build)
description: Building a new wood or composite deck including footings, framing, decking, and railing to code.

name: Fence Installation (Full)
description: Installing a complete fence with posts set in concrete, rails, and boards or panels.

name: Roof Snow Removal
description: Safely removing heavy snow accumulation from roofs to prevent structural damage and ice dams.

name: Roof Repair (Shingles)
description: Repairing or replacing damaged roof shingles, flashing, and minor underlayment sections.

name: Full Roof Replacement
description: Complete removal of existing roofing and installation of new shingles, underlayment, and flashing.

name: Attic Insulation Upgrade
description: Adding or replacing attic insulation to meet current energy code requirements (R-50+).

name: Gutter Guard Installation
description: Installing gutter protection systems including micro-mesh or solid cover guards on all gutters.

name: Exterior Door Replacement (Entry)
description: Replacing an exterior entry door including frame, threshold, weather sealing, and hardware.

name: Window Replacement
description: Removing old windows and installing new energy-efficient windows with proper insulation and trim.

name: Garage Door Replacement
description: Removing an old garage door and installing a new one with springs, tracks, and opener.

name: Kitchen Cabinet Installation
description: Installing new kitchen cabinets including wall and base units, leveling, and hardware.

name: Gas Appliance Installation (Range/Dryer)
description: Connecting gas ranges, dryers, and other gas appliances to existing gas lines with proper fittings.

name: Bathtub Replacement
description: Removing and replacing a bathtub including drain connections, surround, and waterproofing.

name: Exterior Siding Replacement
description: Removing old siding and installing new vinyl, wood, or fibre cement siding with housewrap.

name: Stucco Application / Repair
description: Applying new stucco or repairing existing stucco finishes on exterior walls.

name: Chimney Liner Installation
description: Installing a stainless steel chimney liner for a furnace, water heater, or fireplace.

name: Outdoor Electrical Panel / Disconnect
description: Installing outdoor electrical panels, disconnects for AC units, hot tubs, and pool equipment.

name: Structural Beam Installation
description: Installing steel or engineered wood beams for structural support per engineering drawings.

name: Spray Foam Insulation
description: Applying closed-cell or open-cell spray foam insulation in walls, attics, or crawl spaces.

name: Exterior Waterproofing (Foundation)
description: Excavating around the foundation and applying waterproof membrane and drainage systems.

name: Water Softener Installation
description: Installing a whole-house water softener system with bypass valve and drain connection.

name: Skylight Installation
description: Cutting a roof opening and installing a skylight with proper flashing and interior finishing.

name: Staircase Construction / Renovation
description: Building or renovating a staircase including stringers, treads, risers, and railing to code.

name: Driveway Paving (Asphalt)
description: Excavating, grading, and paving a residential driveway with hot-mix asphalt.

name: Pool Installation (Above-Ground)
description: Installing an above-ground pool including site prep, assembly, plumbing, and electrical hookup.

name: Home Security System Hardwired Installation
description: Installing a hardwired home security system with sensors, keypads, and monitoring equipment.

name: Geothermal Heat Pump Installation
description: Installing a geothermal (ground-source) heat pump system with loop field and heat exchanger.

name: Biohazard Cleanup
description: Professional cleaning and decontamination of areas exposed to blood, bodily fluids, or other biohazards.

name: Foundation Crack Repair (Interior Injection)
description: Repairing foundation cracks from the interior using epoxy or polyurethane injection.

name: Hydronic Heating Pipe Repair
description: Repairing or replacing sections of hydronic (hot water) heating piping in baseboard or radiant systems.

name: Electrical Permit & ESA Inspection Coordination
description: Pulling ESA permits, coordinating inspections, and ensuring electrical work meets Ontario Electrical Safety Code.

name: Room Addition Framing
description: Structural framing for a room addition including walls, headers, and roof tie-in per engineering plans.

name: Hot Tub / Spa Moving
description: Disconnecting, moving, and reconnecting a hot tub or spa, including crane service if needed.

name: Duct Cleaning (Professional NADCA Standard)
description: Professional HVAC duct cleaning per NADCA standards using specialized negative air equipment.

name: Soffit & Fascia Replacement
description: Removing and replacing damaged soffit and fascia boards with aluminum, vinyl, or wood.

name: Accessibility Renovation (Barrier-Free)
description: Modifying a home for accessibility including ramps, grab bars, doorway widening, and roll-in showers.
